#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--){
        unsigned long long int n;
        scanf("%llu", &n);
        if(n==0){
            printf("No\n");
        }
        else if(n%2==0){
            printf("Yes\n");
        }
        else{
            printf("No\n");
        }
        
    }
}
